mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ancient Roman bloodletting cup (replica)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Replica of ancient Roman bloodletting cup, wet and dry, from the first century AD; variation of type B2. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Greek and Roman
Cupping
phlebotomy
